text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-78NP 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified). The keyboard is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1060 in the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 300 PH315-51-78NP 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
